ThingDef.label: skull
ThingDef.description: A biological human skull. Protects the brain and scares people.

ThingDef.label: brain
ThingDef.description: A biological human brain. Gives a creature the ability to think.

ThingDef.label: leg
ThingDef.description: A biological human leg. Basically long meaty sticks that let you move around.

ThingDef.label: foot
ThingDef.description: A biological human foot. The thing you can put shoes on.

ThingDef.label: arm
ThingDef.description: A biological human arm. Arms are like legs, except you can carry stuff with them.

ThingDef.label: hand
ThingDef.description: A biological human hand. A man's best friend.

ThingDef.label: stomach
ThingDef.description: A biological human stomach. Digests food and turns it into energy and nutrients.

ThingDef.label: heart
ThingDef.description: A biological human heart. Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body.

ThingDef.label: lung
ThingDef.description: A biological human lung. A pair of these form the core of the human respiratory system.

ThingDef.label: kidney
ThingDef.description: A biological human kidney. Filters and removes waste products from the blood.

ThingDef.label: liver
ThingDef.description: A biological human liver. Plays an important role in metabolism.

ThingDef.label: eyeball
ThingDef.description: A biological human eye. Absorbs light, which lets a person know what's around them.

ThingDef.label: nose
ThingDef.description: A biological human nose. A pretty useful organ to distinguish odors, applies the finishing touch to a face.

ThingDef.label: ear
ThingDef.description: A biological human ear. Picks up vibrations in the air, allowing people to hear sound.

ThingDef.label: jaw
ThingDef.description: A biological human jaw. A nice set of teeth for chewing food and talking.
